version_description: 細部介面調整

感謝一直以來支持我們使用 Qubii 備份豆腐 的用戶。 我們將持續更新 App 讓它更好。

- 修改部份訊息文字
- 自動調整「完整備份相簿」在不同語系的預設目錄名稱
- 修正部份存在手機相簿內的無效影片（影片無法播放），影響完整備份的問題。
- 新增隱私權聲明

感謝一直以來支持我們使用 Qubii 備份豆腐 的用戶。 我們將持續更新 App 讓它更好。

- 修正部份 Live Photo 項目，在連接到 Windows 被破壞結構後，無法備份的問題

感謝一直以來支持我們使用 Qubii 備份豆腐 的用戶。 我們將持續更新 App 讓它更好。

- 整體效能優化

感謝一直以來支持我們使用 Qubii 備份豆腐 的用戶。 我們將持續更新 App 讓它更好。

- 細部優化調整

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Localize strings adjustment
- Added extra info regarding iCloud items when backup completes
- Restoring photos and videos from memory card are now included in backup records
- Fix Live Photo playback

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Fix a potential issue with iCloud photo backup
- Add Simplified Chinese localization

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Fix the work flow of asking for Contacts permission when setting up Qubii for the first time.
- Fix an issue when backup Instagram / Flickr right after login in.

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Optimize display for new iPhone XS Max

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Minor bug fix

- Minor bug fix

- Instagram bug fix

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Fix Japanese and Italian strings

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Fix minor issue with photo restore

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Minor bug fix
- Minor adjustments on user interface and work flows

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Main menu layout adjustments for iPad
- Japanese App Store description added

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

New feature :

- Backup “My Albums” created in native Photo App to be saved to corresponding folders on memory card
- Restore folders (multi-layered) from memory card would create corresponding “My Albums” in native Photo App
- New Twitter backup, support multiple account login
- Instagram backup now includes “Story”, and support multiple account login
- Photos edited by native Photo App may also keep its original version during backup
- Photos with RAW format may also be kept during backup
- Added Map view for photo info display

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Adjust the display for iPad Pro 3rd Generation
- Fixed issue with deleting photos on iOS 10

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

New Features for iPad
- App display is available in landscape
- Support “Split View” with two Apps multitasking
- Support “Slide Over” as a second App multitasking
- Support “Drag and Drop” between Apps

New backup item
- Backup purchased items from local iTunes library

New for Qubii Pro
- Access content on memory card via “File” App
- Third-party Apps can access memory card through “File” App

Thank you for using Qubii ! To make this app better, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.
